top.title: US and Ukraine signal peace plan progress after Geneva talks
top.summary: Both sides say "intensive work" will take place on outstanding issues following talks on a US-backed plan to end the war.

top.title: Gaza food kitchens still missing essential products despite ceasefire
top.summary: Israel is allowing more food into Gaza, but aid workers say vital ingredients needed to improve people's diets are still missing.

top.title: Machu Picchu hit by a row over tourist buses
top.summary: Protests have taken place over the coaches that take visitors up to the world heritage site in Peru.

top.title: Vinted blocks 'sickening' sexually explicit ads
top.summary: The online marketplace removed adverts which included a video a user said depicted a pornographic scene.

top.title: Teens plead not guilty over TfL cyber-attack
top.summary: Thalha Jubair, 19, and Owen Flowers, 18,  are charged with conspiring to commit unauthorised acts.

top.title: Graduate jobs under threat from AI, PwC boss says
top.summary: The accountancy giant says artificial intelligence will eventually lead to fewer entry-level positions at the firm.

Why college students prefer News Daddy over The New York Times
Microsoft is speeding up and decluttering File Explorer in Windows 11
